fullText: Tony Shalhoub gives a masterly performance as Moss Hart in James Lapine's adaptation of the playwright's beloved memoir about his collaboration with George S. Kaufman.
dtliExcerpt: Tony Shalhoub gives a masterly performance as Moss Hart in James Lapine's adaptation of the playwright's beloved memoir about his collaboration with George S. Kaufman.
